CustomField.description: Check this checkbox to indicate that the settlement verdict amount has been received. For example when entering a resolution after you have already received a check. This will mark down the deposit in the ledger.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this checkbox to indicate that the settlement verdict amount has been received. For example when entering a resolution after you have already received a check. This will mark down the deposit in the ledger.
CustomField.label: Settlement/Verdict Amount Was Received
